languages.text: "Знамения — не прихоть разума. Они повсюду для того, чьи глаза открыты. Однако в словах твоих есть смысл. Раздумья о сходстве с Немезитом вселяют в меня смятение, а сие есть слабость. Мне должно направить мысли на путь, что приведет к победе".

"Omens are not just the idle whimsy of a sluggish mind. They appear everywhere to those who have eyes to see them. And yet, your words ring true. Thinking about how alike Nemesite and I are is deeply distressing to me, and this is a weakness. I must instead focus my thoughts on the thread that will lead us to victory."
languages.original_text: "Знамения — не прихоть разума. Они повсюду для того, чьи глаза открыты. Однако в словах твоих есть смысл. Раздумья о сходстве с Немезитом вселяют в меня смятение, а сие есть слабость. Мне должно направить мысли на путь, что приведет к победе".

traits.locale_text: "Omens are not the idle whimsy of a sluggish mind. They are everywhere to someone with the eyes to see, yet your words make sense. Thinking about how much like the Nemesite I am makes me distraught, and this is a weakness. I must direct my thoughts to the path that will lead to victory."

"Omens are not the idle whimsy of a sluggish mind. They are everywhere to someone with the eyes to see, yet your words make sense. Thinking about how much like the Nemesite I am makes me distraught, and this is a weakness. I must direct my thoughts to the path that will lead to victory."

"Omens are not just the idle whimsy of a sluggish mind. They appear everywhere to those who have eyes to see them. And yet, your words ring true. Thinking about how alike the Nemesite and I are is deeply distressing to me, and this is a weakness. I must instead focus my thoughts on the path that will lead us to victory."

Thinking about how alike Nemesite and I are is deeply distressing to me, and this is a weakness. I must instead focus my thoughts on the thread that will lead us to victory."

"Omens are not just the idle whimsy of a sluggish mind. They appear everywhere to those who have eyes to see them. And yet, your words ring true. Thinking about how alike Nemesite and I are is deeply distressing to me, and this is a weakness. I must instead focus my thoughts on the thread that will lead us to victory."

languages.text: "Omen sind mehr als die Launen eines trägen Geistes. Sie erscheinen jenen, die sie sehen können, überall. Und doch habt Ihr recht. Der Gedanke, wie ähnlich mir Nemesit ist, beunruhigt mich, und das ist eine Schwäche. Ich muss mich auf den Faden konzentrieren, der uns zum Sieg führen wird.
languages.original_text: "Omens are not just the idle whimsy of a sluggish mind. They appear everywhere to those who have eyes to see them. And yet, your words ring true. Thinking about how alike Nemesite and I are is deeply distressing to me, and this is a weakness. I must instead focus my thoughts on the thread that will lead us to victory."

traits.locale_text: "Omen sind mehr als die Launen eines trägen Geistes. Sie erscheinen jenen, die sie sehen können, überall. Und doch habt Ihr recht. Der Gedanke, wie ähnlich mir Nemesit ist, beunruhigt mich, und das ist eine Schwäche. Ich muss mich auf den Faden konzentrieren, der uns zum Sieg führen wird.

languages.text: «Los augurios no son solo caprichos de una mente turbada: aparecen por doquier para quienes saben verlos. Aun así, no le falta razón en lo que dice. Pensar en lo parecidos que somos Nemesitio y yo me perturba profundamente, y eso es una debilidad. No, he de centrar mis pensamientos en el hilo que nos conducirá hasta la victoria».
languages.original_text: "Omens are not just the idle whimsy of a sluggish mind. They appear everywhere to those who have eyes to see them. And yet, your words ring true. Thinking about how alike Nemesite and I are is deeply distressing to me, and this is a weakness. I must instead focus my thoughts on the thread that will lead us to victory."

traits.locale_text: «Los augurios no son solo caprichos de una mente turbada: aparecen por doquier para quienes saben verlos. Aun así, no le falta razón en lo que dice. Pensar en lo parecidos que somos Nemesitio y yo me perturba profundamente, y eso es una debilidad. No, he de centrar mis pensamientos en el hilo que nos conducirá hasta la victoria».

languages.text: 「予言は単なる気の迷いじゃない。それを見る目を持つ者には、どこにでも現れるものよ。それでもあなたの言葉には真実味がある。ネメサイトと私がいかに似ているかを考えることは、私にとって深い苦痛であり弱点でもあるわ。そんなことより、私たちを勝利へと導く道に思考を集中させないといけないわね」
languages.original_text: "Omens are not just the idle whimsy of a sluggish mind. They appear everywhere to those who have eyes to see them. And yet, your words ring true. Thinking about how alike Nemesite and I are is deeply distressing to me, and this is a weakness. I must instead focus my thoughts on the thread that will lead us to victory."

traits.locale_text: 「予言は単なる気の迷いじゃない。それを見る目を持つ者には、どこにでも現れるものよ。それでもあなたの言葉には真実味がある。ネメサイトと私がいかに似ているかを考えることは、私にとって深い苦痛であり弱点でもあるわ。そんなことより、私たちを勝利へと導く道に思考を集中させないといけないわね」

languages.text: “预示并不是什么毫无根据的突发奇想，它们无处不在，等待着被人察觉。不过，你的话确实有道理。每当我想到自己与涅墨斯特多么相像时，我就感到无比痛苦，这是我的弱点。我必须抛开这些，把目光集中在通往胜利的丝线之上。”
languages.original_text: "Omens are not just the idle whimsy of a sluggish mind. They appear everywhere to those who have eyes to see them. And yet, your words ring true. Thinking about how alike Nemesite and I are is deeply distressing to me, and this is a weakness. I must instead focus my thoughts on the thread that will lead us to victory."

traits.locale_text: “预示并不是什么毫无根据的突发奇想，它们无处不在，等待着被人察觉。不过，你的话确实有道理。每当我想到自己与涅墨斯特多么相像时，我就感到无比痛苦，这是我的弱点。我必须抛开这些，把目光集中在通往胜利的丝线之上。”

languages.text: « Plus que de simples illusions nées d'un esprit gourd, les présages se manifestent partout aux yeux de ceux qui savent se montrer attentifs. Pour autant, il y a du vrai, dans ce que vous dites. Songer aux ressemblances frappantes que je partage avec Némésite me plonge dans le plus profond désarroi. C'est une faiblesse qu'il me faut chasser de mon esprit pour mieux me concentrer sur le fil qui nous mènera à la victoire. »
languages.original_text: "Omens are not just the idle whimsy of a sluggish mind. They appear everywhere to those who have eyes to see them. And yet, your words ring true. Thinking about how alike Nemesite and I are is deeply distressing to me, and this is a weakness. I must instead focus my thoughts on the thread that will lead us to victory."

traits.locale_text: « Plus que de simples illusions nées d'un esprit gourd, les présages se manifestent partout aux yeux de ceux qui savent se montrer attentifs. Pour autant, il y a du vrai, dans ce que vous dites. Songer aux ressemblances frappantes que je partage avec Némésite me plonge dans le plus profond désarroi. C'est une faiblesse qu'il me faut chasser de mon esprit pour mieux me concentrer sur le fil qui nous mènera à la victoire. »

languages.text: "Alametler yalnızca tembel bir zihinden çıkan anlamsız fikirler değildirler. Onları görebilen gözlere sahip olanlar için her yerdedirler. Yine de sözlerinin doğruluğuna şüphe yok. Nemezit'le ne kadar benzer olduğumuz düşüncesi benim için rahatsızlık verici ve bu da bir zayıflık. Düşüncelerimi onun yerine bizi zafere ulaştıracak ipliğe odaklamalıyım."
languages.original_text: "Omens are not just the idle whimsy of a sluggish mind. They appear everywhere to those who have eyes to see them. And yet, your words ring true. Thinking about how alike Nemesite and I are is deeply distressing to me, and this is a weakness. I must instead focus my thoughts on the thread that will lead us to victory."
